title: Modern Somerville 3 Bedroom! Only 1/2 months broker fee
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 249842805', 'Rent: $3,500 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: street parking', '- 9/1/22 move in.', '- Virtual tour is available.', '- Gleaming wood flooring.', '- Kitchen has stainless steel appliances.', '- 1/2 months broker fee.', '- Laundry in building.', 'Call now!', 'Bus: 83 Hampshire St @ Cambridge St (0.54 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Webster Ave @', 'Prospect St (0.21 mi)', 'Bus: 69 Cambridge St @ Windsor St (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ Merriam St (0.04 mi)', 'Bus: 91 25 Webster Ave @ Newton St (0.23 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.16 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Merriam St (0.13 mi)', 'Bus: 88 Medford St @ Washington St (0.21 mi)', 'Bus: 90 Cross St @ Chester Ave (0.35 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Cross St @ Alston St (0.35 mi)', '-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------', 'Val Temin', '6177845998', 'If you would like to take a look at additional apartment options please see below:', 'https://ygl.is/valvel-temin', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
